name: ForestQuest
description:
This is my first "complete" game, in so much as it has a start screen some gameplay and a win/lose screen.

It's a short sweet top down adventure with various art works made by myself and modified pieces from "OpenGameArt.org" and "kenny.nl", music is by FrenchyBoy and Frederic Chopin (Arranged by Jon K Fite), Crow is based on ma9ici4n's.

I would love to hear your thoughts!

Controls are W,A,S,D for movement, E to interact/talk, Space or > to attack and Enter to Accept.

A game by Glacial Developments!
